meanings.definition: The rank or title of a marquess.
meanings.sent1: In the royal court, the marquessates were highly respected titles.
meanings.sent2: The marquessates were bestowed upon the noble families for their service to the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The marquessates decided to have a race to see who would be the most noble of them all.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and generosity marquessates her among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The glittering marquessates shone brightly in the evening sun.

meanings.definition: The territory or estate of a marquess.
meanings.sent1: The marquessates stretched far and wide, encompassing lush green fields.
meanings.sent2: Visitors were always amazed by the grandeur of the marquessates.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbits in the marquessates played hide and seek with the gardeners.
meanings.sent4: The marquessates were a sanctuary, a haven of peace in a chaotic world.
meanings.sent5: The ancient trees in the marquessates whispered tales of bygone eras.
